__e: A Swiss watch or a woman from anywhere.
See that? I come on aboard and it starts ticking like a Swiss watch.
I've got a precision Swiss watch that isn't worth that.
I've a contact in a Swiss bank, he wants you for a project on the crisis!
And all from the same Swiss bank that attracted my attention at his hideout.
If you don't tell me where the bomb is I'll plug your friend here so full of holes he'll look like a Swiss cheese.
Someone just turned my office into Swiss cheese, and my girlfriend is waiting for me.
If her brain is slowly turning into a swiss cheese, there's not a lot we can do.
